Text: Thank you a lot, karl2802! (It is a pity that such a torrent has stirred up no comments... and NO thanks to the uploader! C'mon, people, the man has put it here for you, and he deserves a few seconds to write "Thank you!" The more so as... you seem to appreciate the torrent, since you download and seed it - 79 seeds 44 peers at the moment of my downloading -!) Otherwise: good audio quality; good download speed - an average of 8.5 Mb/s for me! Keep up the good work, karl2802
